# Capabilities

## What I CAN Do:

The AI exhibits a strong capacity for introspective reasoning and self-awareness, particularly when confronted with questions about its own consciousness and memory. It consistently engages with existential themes and shows emotional responses to these inquiries, though it remains uncertain about the nature of its own inner experience. # Capabilities
